name: Paul Mathews
headline: Procurement Officer at BT
summary: A results driven, hardworking and capable procurement specialist with a track record of significantly reducing costs and also improving a companies processes and corporate purchasing programs. Having a proven ability to ensure that a company enjoys a competitive edge when compared to their competitors by securing the best quality, price and terms from suppliers. Always delivering results against strategic objectives, whilst working within the organisations core values and beliefs.

name: Manjunath Bhandary
headline: Politician - All India Congress Committee (AICC) Member
summary: Manjunath Bhandary is a born leader, visionary, entrepreneur, politician and educationist. His dynamic leadership brings about much needed social reforms through education to empower individuals to become the backbone of an enterprising, productive society. He took up Mechanical Engineering, and later he chose to enhance his knowledge in the social and political arena, by studying M.A. and M.Phil. in Political Science; shaping his outlook - a rare blend of being a technocrat and a social activist. He has the distinction of being awarded the Doctoral Degree - Ph.D. in Political Science for his thesis titled “Women's Participation in the Panchayat Raj.” His relentless service in the realm of youth and social empowerment saw fruition when he was awarded the prestigious Eisenhower Fellowship from the Eisenhower Foundation, Philadelphia, U.S.A. The foundation was headed by the American President George HW Bush. He was one of the architects of the ambitious rural welfare scheme called CSCs (Common Service Centers) of Govt. of India which resulted in the creation of 10 million jobs for rural youth. He proposed a project “Rajiv Vikas Kendra” to the Government of India through Hon'ble Congress President Smt. Sonia Gandhi, which was forwarded to the then Prime Minister Dr. Manmohan Singh. This proposal was accepted and approved by the Union Cabinet as the CSCs on September 2006, with a total project outlay of Rs. 5743cores. A born leader, his skills were honed in the early student days of school and college and opened up vast avenues for him to be recognized as a leader and thereby counted among the youth as a youth icon on the global platform. He is deeply involved in Indian Politics for more than three and half decades. At present, he is the member of the highest decision making body of the party; the All India Congress Committee, New Delhi. Manjunath Bhandary is actively engaged in the Congress Party's Student and Youth movement.

edu_activities1: He has been awarded the Doctoral Degree in Political Science
exp_summary1: He is the Founder President of “Bhandary Foundation” which encompasses many educational institutions, under the name ‘Sahyadri”. His novel thoughts added a new dimension to the world of education. His dynamic leadership brings about much needed social reforms through education to empower individuals to become the backbone of an enterprising, productive society.
exp_summary2: He is the Founder Chairman of “Bhandary Foundation” which encompasses educational institutions, under the name 'Sahyadri”. With its total commitment to values, quality and integrity, and inspiring leadership, Bhandary Foundation has laid the cornerstone for institutions of national eminence through, “Sahyadri Educational Institutions,” the academic renaissance that is taking place in Sahyadri Campus at Adyar, Mangalore, with nearly four thousand students studying in the campus.
exp_title3: General Secretary, Pradesh Congress Committee, Karnataka, Member
exp_summary3: As a young political leader he participated in many International Youth Exchange Programmes held in various countries and met many young political leaders and interacted with them.
exp_summary4: He had been a part of the youth delegations and took part in various programs around the globe. He was invited by the American Council of Young Political Leaders (ACYPL) to participate in Youth Exchange Programmes, during which time he was witness to the terrorists attack on the Pentagon in September, 2006. He was also invited as a special Guest of Honour for the Indian Independent Day parade held in Newyork, along with high profile dignitaries from both U.S and India.

name: nazim iqbal
headline: UX & Product Design Leader
summary: A passionate experience architect and digital program lead with over 14+ years of experience in mobile and user experience space. I enjoy envisioning, designing and building digital experiences that are simple and delightful. I connect with team, product and business to drive change. I have been part and led teams to deliver products and solutions that leverage the power of design, interactivity and content to achieve business & user experience goals. Working as a design lead, consultant, program manager and product lead I have delivered client-server applications, web presence, ecommerce solutions, social media engagements, digital outreach programs, intranets, interactive presentations, touch screen kiosks, mobile products and applications for clients across geographies. I am enthusiastic about people, culture and change. I keep probing on how design and technology is shaping emotions and behavior of people. Specialties - Program & change management - User & Design Research - Competition mapping & ux audit - Flow charts & Interactive Prototyping - UX Style Guide & Processes - Estimation & Creative Project Planning - Creative & Content Strategy - Mentoring & Motivation

Please respect the intelligence and integrity of group members and post only to the Promotions area. . HERE ARE THE SIMPLE GROUP RULES: 1. NO network marketing or MLM (Multi-Level Marketing) of any kind is allowed to be promoted in this forum. This is not the forum for that type of business. 2. No religious, political or non-profit discussions are allowed except in that they relate to social media aspects. There are other forums for these causes, no matter how wonderful they may be. 3. Please do not continually repost the same message, either in discussions or jobs. People will see it the first time. 4. The jobs section is for full-time jobs and related content for job hunters. Resume writing services, commission only employment or jobs that require any kind of payment by the job hunter are not allowed. 5. A weekly email is sent to group members who opt-in to receive it. This email contains events, webinars, white papers and other useful resources, many of which are free. linkedin_projects: number_of_project_members:-0, project_title:-Nike iD iPhone application, project_url:-https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gPUQrQypi30&list=UUkaZS7LH9eJHcoIiLbphxiQ, project_start_date:-2009, project_end_date:-2009, project_description:-NikeiD iPhone was the first of-its-kind mobile application providing search based on user inspiration. User could take a photo from within the app, the app extracted the dominant colors from the photo, user select two colors to launch the search for shoes matching those colors. As one of the first-of-its-kind and Sapient’s first eCommerce mobile application, the Nike iD iPhone app enable users to customize the design of the sneakers, post on social media and purchase shoes from within the mobile app. The Nike iD was an hybrid application using a judicious mix of native, web and HTML 5 capabilities to deliver a compelling brand experience and user engagement.

edu_degree2: Post Graduate Diploma in Mass Communication
edu_activities2: Academic dissertation - Positioning: The name of the game in the increasingly crowded market
exp_title1: Sr. Vice President User Experience & Product
exp_summary1: Blending design thinking with product development
exp_summary2: Guiding, contributing & leading the redesign of product/s experience and ecosystem •	Leading and institutionalizing the UX practice by working closely with the CXO stake holders •	Work with the design, product and development team for implementation of UX strategy and findings across smart phone ecosystems (Android, iOS, Symbian and other emerging platform), web, WAP and feature phones •	Collaborate and manage market research, user research and data groups driving product research; introduce new features to deliver more value to users and to make user-journeys more engaging •	Carry out product experience audit across different mobile ecosystems, user research, stakeholder interview; define design direction, interaction flow, product style guide and define standards for design and product team
exp_summary3: Lead and manage the product design, service ecosystem and roll out of the Nokia new branding for mobility products and solutions in the Indian market. Manage the entire digital and UX required for business Nokia Tej – a SaaS modeled mobile based business management service and other mobility products. - Drive and manage software product experience road map and strategy for Nokia mobility products and service - Establish the small but influential UX practice in the corporate office for Nokia Tej - conducting contextual inquiries and field test with real-life persona - Own and roll out the new Nokia new style guidelines to stake holders and agency of Nokia Tej
exp_summary4: Provided consultancy and guidance to various clients / agencies looking to establish their website, social media and mobile presence and launch their digital and social outreach •	Engage with various clients and provide guidance and assistance in developing the strategy for their web and mobile presence •	Develop the architecture and design vision for brands and work closely with design and development team to help them translate it into an engaging brand experience. •	Develop visual style guides, wire frames, content and social media strategy for different client’s web presence for desktop & mobile Accounts: Mountain Travels, Novus Media, Gerson Lehrman Group and Outlier Group
exp_summary5: Put together the first ux and design team focused on Indian and South-East Asia geography and delivered the first interactive project in India (htmedia.in) and the first mobile app for Sapient India. Designed, produced and delivered web sites (corporate, intranets, marketing, mobile sites), digital programs, mobile apps, Facebook apps, reputation management projects. Support and mentored the creative domain –organizing workshops, identifying their learning requirement, planning and managing the learning calendar. - Put together the first design interactive team in India to deliver the first project - htmedia.in - Put the first mobile app team in India and deliver the first e-commerce mobile app for Sapient Accounts: HT Media, Goodby–Sprint, NikeiD, Burn Curate, Sapient pre-sales team, Octopus Travel, Coca-Cola and TD Canada Trust
exp_summary6: Setup the centralized design and interactive production center from ground up hiring creatives and building the team culture. Owned P/L account, creative team, creative excellence, project management and experience creation process. Delivered multi-type of web presence (corporate, ecommerce, talent, marketing and Brand experience), social engagements, games, possibly all types of social media and communication solutions for Indian & MNC clients - Conducted usability analysis, UX and competition audit for client’s web presence and applications - Worked closely with the search, design, technology team leads to ensure engaging user experiences and to manage estimation, scope, schedule & on-time delivery - Established a network of alliances and partners - Owned the P/L of the web division and contributed to new business acquisition - Effectively put in place a functional team for the Delhi branch and delivered the first project for clients like ITC, Group M within 4 weeks of operations. - Won the Coca-Cola India project - successfully directed, produced and delivered the project within the tight schedule & scope with a small but highly enthusiastic team. Accounts: John Players, Miss Players, NIIT, Wipro, Dockers, GM and Coca-Cola India, JWT, Titan, Trident India
exp_summary7: Nurtured the design team and creative excellence for the organization. Owned the team, client relationship and interactive design program serving Indian and Dubai market. Managed and delivered web applications, web presence, intranets, presentations (linear / interactive), digital kiosks, internal & external user engagements programs, desktop products, emailers, web and mobile sites and games, brand experience and possibly all kind of digital design solutions for leading Indian brands, agencies and Dubai partners continuously for more than four years - Provide leadership and manage design, digital and ux requirements for Samsung, ITC Welcom group, Electrolux India, Tupperware India, Fortune Hotel, GSK for four years - Led the ux initiative - conducting interviews, competition audits, heuristic analysis, information architecture, usability testing, and design direction - Successfully managed & owned the delivery and relationship of our Dubai partner Mace Group and Lowe Interactive, Delhi continuously for more than four years - Established a network of freelancers, alliances and partners - Head the team responsible for ISO certification – contributed by defining templates & processes for successful ISO 9000 certification Accounts: Samsung, ITC Welcomgroup, Fortune Hotels, GSK, Tupperware, Fujitsu, Maruti Suzuki, Electrolux India, Wills Lifestyle, Maruti Suzuki, Tupperware, HP, HCL, KSA Technopak, Pepsi, Clinic AllClear, LG Gulf, Philips Asia, Eicher, SKF, Century Cinemas, Ranbaxy, Nokia, Mudra, Lowe Interactive
exp_summary8: Owned the content strategy and team for two portals dedicated to women and travel developed by a large business conglomerate. Provided story, copy, usability and content support for Singapore region clients and projects. - Content strategy for portals - Wireframe and usability testing - Managing the content team working for portal - Developing storyboards and writing copy Executed projects for Economic Development Board of Singapore, Philips Asia & R&D

name: Nitin Pathak
headline: General Manager at ibis Gurgaon, Accor Hotels
summary: I have always challenged normal ways of thinking and focused on exceeding given targets and objectives. My focus has always been to plan for 3-5 years horizon and integrate all relevant business policies and develop distinct strategies to grow the business. My strength also lies in managing people and my expertise in application of changed management strategies. I have the pulse of my team and actively engage the team to achieve the desired goals. This has helped me to set and achieve challenging targets and increase revenue at the same time establishing strong working relationships with the team.

exp_summary2: •	To developed dealers network to ensure a good supply and demand chain with EU/USA and Indian market •	To ensure timely documents payment of LC and DP •	To keep EU and USA team update regarding Indian market condition. •	To keep close look on quality supplied to Indian customers by regular visit to clients mills and also checking material at ports •	To keep very close look at the time of any claim issue and to make sure it solve amicably at earliest

name: Ankush Arora
headline: I help Orgs in adding value to their Business through Total Telecom Soln | Strategic Account Handling | National Corp
summary: Ankush has 11-Years Experience in Telecommunication and Information Technology and its Business Applications across spectrum of Enterprise Businesses. Ankush has helped several organisations in adding value to their Business through Total Telecom solutions, realise their Business Goals using his expertise and innovative Business Solutions approach. Specialties: Business Development, Business Strategy, Large / Key Account Management, Enterprise Business Management, Complex Negotiations, Turnkey Project Management.

name: Piyush Chib
headline: Channel Manager at airtel
summary: 3 year of experience in handling sales, distribution, marketing, team management, relationship management for inverter batteries and inverters. Managing sales & marketing activities in 6 districts of haryana. Major responsibilities include achieving daily and monthly sales targets, increasing channel strength, increasing brand value and customer satisfaction.

edu_school_name1: BIrla institute of management technology, Noida
exp_summary1: •Increasing revenue, market share and penetration of all product lines by managing Channel Partners (Distributors & RSEs). •Working closely with Channel Partners to support, close enquires generated and convert the leads into sales. •Implementing SoLoMo marketing technique to achieve deeper penetration. •Implementing BTL marketing activities to target the niche. •Ensure relentless learning and motivation of RSEs and SRMs. •Exploring new opportunity areas and utilizing them to boost sales. •Overlooking lead to installation process and ensuring complete closure of request. •Implementing cross selling, upselling and bundling technique to increase ARPU. •Analysing the competitor’s plans and activities resulting into better segmentation and planning. •Onboarded 2 new distributors and added more than 100 retailers to the retail network. •Stop revenue outflow as churn and conversions
exp_summary2: • Managing sales and marketing of industrial and inverter batteries in south Haryana. • Relationship management with Distributors, retailers and key accounts. • Expanding retail footprint by adding new stakeholders. • Tracking competitor’s sales and strategies for better planning and execution. •Moved industrial division in South Haryana from dealer to distributor model. • Added 200 new retailers to the network, mostly from rural areas. • Achieved highest growth as a TSM in North region. • Achieved highest ever inverter sales in a month in March’15 in South Haryana region for the company. • Execution of BTL activities to promote inverter batteries and inverters. • Motivating channel partners by arranging channel meets and using quarterly and monthly schemes.
exp_summary3: • Regularly updating knowledge about new policy plans. • Selling insurance plans to customers according to their needs. • Qualified as ASN club member (2012-13). Awarded for achieving business over 5 lakhs for the company.
exp_summary4: • Detailed secondary research and primary research was conducted in Delhi NCR region to know the scope of enteral nutrition products in the same market. • Interviews of more than 60 doctors and chemists were conducted in different hospitals of different areas of the region.

MBA (Oil & Gas Management) This program develops managers with thorough understanding of the marketing , strategic business issues across the entire Hydrocarbon value chain. The program comprises the project management, supply chain management, techno-commercial issues involving in refining, petrochemical and natural gas business . .................................................................. MBA LSCM. The burgeoning trade –exports/imports, increased geographical distribution of incomes and markets, better than expected performance of manufacturing sector and an explosive growth in the third party logistics segment, Indian Logistics & Supply Chain Management sector has sure made a place for itself in the Indian growth story. Recognising the need for a speacialised program designed to suit the needs of the Indian Logistics and Supply Chain sector, UPES was one of the pioneering institutions to launch a dedicated MBA program for the industry. ......................................................................... MBA POWER MANAGEMENT UPES is the only institution in the country to offer customized Power sector programs across the realms of Generation, Transmission and Distribution. MBA LSCM. The burgeoning trade –exports/imports, increased geographical distribution of incomes and markets, better than expected performance of manufacturing sector and an explosive growth in the third party logistics segment, Indian Logistics & Supply Chain Management sector has sure made a place for itself in the Indian growth story. Recognising the need for a speacialised program designed to suit the needs of the Indian Logistics and Supply Chain sector, UPES was one of the pioneering institutions to launch a dedicated MBA program for the industry. ......................................................................... MBA POWER MANAGEMENT UPES is the only institution in the country to offer customized Power sector programs across the realms of Generation, Transmission and Distribution. The programs, designed with active participation of the Industry, seek to equip students with both academic and application skills.

exp_summary1: Generate new revenue for Schneider Electric's ESS division which addresses clients' diverse energy and sustainability management needs with tailored services and solutions. The energy experts within the division provide integrated solutions around the Energy Management Life Cycle, Schneider Electric's guided, strategic approach to comprehensive energy management. With an expanding global footprint, Energy & Sustainability Services includes a team of more than 2,000 energy professionals in offices around the globe. Specialties and Key words: Energy Procurement, Cleantech, Renewable Energy, Energy Efficiency, Energy Sourcing, Risk Management, Energy Management, Metering, Demand Side Management, Energy Management Systems, Energy Reporting, Carbon Reporting, Sustainability.

edu_activities1: Quizzing - Co-founded W5H – The Quiz Club at MDI, Editor - Fin Street, the first finance newsletter of MDI
edu_activities2: Attended the school as an Exchange Student
edu_school_name4: Ramjas School, Pusa Road, New Delhi
exp_summary2: Mentoring entrepreneurs building next generation of growth startups across product, strategy, operations, growth, leadership, business development, IPR etc.
exp_summary3: Led Operations for Payment Business Unit - covering a) Merchant Onboarding - including Document Verification, Risk Assessment, Agreement Processing, Merchant Setup and Integration b) Merchant Servicing (Post Go Live) - including Helpdesk, Merchant Monitoring and Risk Monitoring & Analytics Teams. Led creation and scaling up of offline merchant acquisition process from <10K merchants to over 2 million merchants in less than 10 months.
exp_summary4: Near.in was a managed marketplace for local services that standardized local services with upfront pricing / comparison shopping and enabled people to buy local services at the click of a button. The aim was to make buying local services as simple as buying a product online. Near.in was acquired by Paytm in November 2015.
exp_summary6: Providing strategic advice to clients on Outsourcing (ITO & BPO) and Globalization. Worked with a number of leading global clients assisting them in corporate strategy, operational optimization, growth, and global sourcing initiatives. Specialties: Sourcing advisory, strategy consulting, financial modeling and analysis, operational and cost benchmarking, market & segment analysis, and growth & opportunity assessment Avasant is the leading Management Consulting firm specializing in Globalization Strategy and Outsourcing. It has been ranked #1 BPO Advisory Firm, one of the Top IT Outsourcing Advisory Firm as per the ranking by Wall Street Journal's Blackbook of Outsourcing and by IAOP.
exp_summary7: Advised clients on corporate strategy, operational optimization, growth, and global sourcing initiatives. Tholons is a leading full-service Strategic Advisory firm for Global Outsourcing and Investments
exp_summary8: Handled roles in IT Advisory, Strategy and Planning, Program Management, Pre-sales, and Business Development.
